briefdescription.para: Creates a new custom document property of the PropertyType.Boolean data type.
Creates a new custom document property of the PropertyType.String data type.
Creates a new custom document property of the PropertyType.Float data type.
Creates a new custom document property of the PropertyType.Number data type.
Creates a new custom document property of the PropertyType.DateTime data type.
Creates a new linked to content custom document property.
A collection of custom document properties.

detaileddescription.para: Each DocumentProperty object represents a custom property of a container document.
The names of the properties are case-insensitive.
The properties in the collection are sorted alphabetically by name.
